By Sudden Enigma on Monday, August 2, 2004 - 10:22 pm:

how do you do a table with diferent colour letters/words in it?

By Infernus on Monday, August 2, 2004 - 11:33 pm:

You need to make the table, and before you put any text, put the colour code. Remember to close both things. So, \table(\green(text))...use the proper things though...

Pretty cool, huh?
